mapper.select: select b.board_num, b.board_category, b.user_id, m.user_name, b.title, b.content, b.content_img, b.content_file, b.write_date, b.readcount from mfg_board b join mfg_member m on b.user_id = m.user_id where b.board_num = #{board_num};
select * from mfg_board where board_num > 0 order by board_num desc
select * from mfg_board order by board_num desc, write_date desc limit #{page},10
